com.absio.broker.mapper

Class PublicKeyMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.broker.mapper.AbstractMapper
      • com.absio.broker.mapper.PublicKeyMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPublicKeySource

    public class PublicKeyMapper
extends AbstractMapper
implements IPublicKeySource
    This maps all public key data to/from the Absio Broker™ application. All create, read, update and delete operations relating to public keys (signing and derivation) for other users in the system are handled by the mapper. No logic for encrypting or decrypting exists in the mapper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PublicKeyMapper(Session session)
      Default constructor.

      IndexedECPublicKey getLatestActive(UUID userId, KeyType type)

        public PublicKeyMapper(Session session)
                throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                       NoSuchPaddingException
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        session - the session for the mapper
        Throws:
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the default padding for symmetric encryption is not supported
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if ECDH is not supported

      • createOrUpdate

        public void createOrUpdate(IndexedECPublicKey publicKey)
                    throws BrokerException,
                           IOException,
                           InterruptedException
        Creates or updates the public key on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - the public key to create or update
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • createOrUpdate

        public void createOrUpdate(ECPublicKey publicKey,
                           KeyType type,
                           int index,
                           boolean active)
                    throws BrokerException,
                           IOException,
                           InterruptedException
        Creates or updates the public key on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - the public key bytes
        type - the KeyType of key
        index - the index of the key
        active - true if the key is active
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • get

        public List<IndexedECPublicKey> get(UUID userId,
                                    KeyType type,
                                    Integer index)
                             throws BrokerException,
                                    IOException,
                                    InterruptedException
        Gets all public keys matching the user ID, key type, key ring index and algorithm index.

        NOTE: pass in null to ignore a parameter.

        Parameters:
        userId - the key owners user's ID or ignored if null
        type - the key type or ignored if null
        index - the key index or ignored if null
        Returns:
        a list of public keys that match the supplied criteria
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • getByIndex

        public IndexedECPublicKey getByIndex(UUID userId,
                                     KeyType type,
                                     int index)
                              throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                     BrokerException,
                                     IOException,
                                     InterruptedException
        This gets the public key that match the user ID, type and index from the Absio Broker™ application.
        Specified by:
        getByIndex in interface IPublicKeySource
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id of the key owner
        type - the KeyType of the key
        index - the index of the key
        Returns:
        the IndexedECPublicKey for the user of the specified KeyType and index
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the parameter arguments are incorrect

      • getLatestActive

        public IndexedECPublicKey getLatestActive(UUID userId,
                                          KeyType type)
                                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                          BrokerException,
                                          IOException,
                                          InterruptedException
        This gets the latest active public key that match the user ID and type from the Absio Broker™ application. This calls GetListAsync and processes the list for active keys. It is needed for the IPublicKeySource interface.

        NOTE: if there is not an active key null will be returned.

        Specified by:
        getLatestActive in interface IPublicKeySource
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID
        type - the KeyType of public key
        Returns:
        the latest active public key for the user of the specified KeyType
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the parameter arguments are incorrect
